other_tests.findings: Right ventricular dilatation and hypertrophy, mild pulmonary arterial hypertension, and a small patent ductus arteriosus.

other_tests.procedure_name: Biopsy of the right middle lobe
other_tests.findings: Lobar emphysema characterized by fewer alveoli and hyperinflated existing alveoli; low number of bronchioles relative to pulmonary vessels.

other_tests.date: When the patient was 6 years of age

other_tests.findings: No mutations were identified initially, but subsequent genetic panel showed a heterozygous mutation in FLNA.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Mutation was identified later, indicating progression in diagnostic testing capacity.
